author: Joel Achenbach
title: Coronavirus is harming the mental health of tens of millions of people in U.S., new poll finds - The Washington Post
description: Coronavirus is harming the mental health of tens of millions of people in U.S., new poll finds The Washington Post N.J. couple feeds hungry during COVID-19 pandemic NJ.com Managing postpartum depression: New moms isolated by coronavirus pandemic The Conversat…
content:
The poll makes one thing clear: If youre scared, anxious, depressed, struggling to sleep through the night, or just on edge, youre not alone.
Its a huge number, Kathy HoganBruen, a Washington clinical psychologist specializing in anxiety disorders, said in r… [+3583 chars]
